Zombie Piglin Experience Farm.Notes: Climb to the top of the scaffolding, then stand on the chest between the two drop chutes.

Enderman Experience Farm.Location: Through the End Portal, off the main island
Enderman Experience Farm.Notes: Follow the waterfall, then walk to the end of the glass pathway. If you don't have a sword with Sweeping Edge III, borrow the sword on the wall by the entrance and swipe at the endermen.

Overworld Mob Experience Farm.Notes: On the northern platform. Will only drop Bows and Experience if you are in Manual mode, which requires you to kill them yourself with a sword. Output is sorted.

Iron Golem Farm.Notes: On the eastern platform. Output is sorted.

Turbo Crop Farm.Notes: On the northern platform. Stand to the right of the farmland and press down right click while holding the crop of your choice. The required bonemeal can be acquired by crafting the bones from the Overworld Mob Experience Farm.

Slime Farm.Notes: AFK Platform is high in the air. Output is underground, down a safe drop chute.

Witch Farm.Notes: AFK Platform is high in the air. Sorted output is in a pit next to the farm.

Guardian Farm.Notes: AFK Platform is high in the air. Sorted output is through the nether portal at the end of the pier.

Honey Farm.Notes: Right on top of the nether roof, to the north once you exit the portal. Craft the output bottles into blocks, then place the empty bottles into marked chest.

Magma Cube Farm.Notes: Use a boat (provided) to travel the ice path after exiting the portal. AFK Platform is high in the air.

Hoglin Farm.Notes: The farm is a short walk from the portal on the nether side: 185x, -448z. Look for the marked pathway. AFK Platform is high in the air. Output is sorted.

Cobblestone Generator.Notes: On the eastern platform. There is an on/off switch, please make sure it is off before leaving, or it will unload and explode itself.

Oak/Birch Log Farm.Notes: Stand on the target block with some saplings in hand, then right click on the dirt block. There is an on/off switch, please make sure it is off before leaving, or it will unload and explode itself. The required bonemeal can be acquired by crafting the bones from the Overworld Mob Experience Farm.

Piglin Bartering Farm.Notes: Right on top of the nether roof, to the south once you exit the portal. The required gold ingots can be acquired by crafting the gold nuggets from the Zombie Piglin Experience Farm. Press the button to start the farm up after both the redstone lamps have turned on.
